## Description {#details}

Helper struct for trackAssignments, below.

We don&#39;t use the similar <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> class because trackAssignments doesn&#39;t (yet?) understand partial variables (fragment info) as input and want to make that clear and explicit using types. In addition, eventually we will want to understand expressions that modify the base address too, which a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> doesn&#39;t capture.

Definition at line 283 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h">DebugInfo.h</a>.
